snippet: The Knicks are expected to match an offer from Houston and keep Jeremy Lin, but even after examining him closely, they are still uncertain about his place in the league.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column holds that although the New York Knicks are expected to match an offer from the Houston Rockets and keep Jeremy Lin, they are still uncertain about his place in the league.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are expected to match an offer from Houston and keep Jeremy Lin, but even after examining him closely, they are still uncertain about his place in the league.

headline.seo: Knicks Should Match Lin’s Offer, but Don’t Exactly Know His Value
headline.main: Knicks Know Lin’s Price, but Value? Not Exactly
headline.print_headline: Knicks Know Lin’s Price, but Not Value
